about_the_game:
This is a realistic universe shooting game that simulates physics, where all enemies are mechanically shattered and performance is deeply optimized.

Fleet Formation Layout: You need to purchase various spaceships and freely construct the desired formation. Each type of spacecraft has a huge difference in functionality, with some attack ships equipped with special laser weapons, antimatter weapons, etc. After purchasing a space carrier, you need to purchase various space fighters separately and place them on the carrier.

Battery layout: You need to purchase various batteries and place them in the spaceship.

After starting the battle, all turrets will obey your command. After pressing the attack button, all turrets, weapons of all spacecraft, and all fighter jets in all aircraft carriers will immediately attack towards your mouse cursor.

When exploring various scenes, you will encounter various powerful bosses, unique enemies, and fight against them.

The characteristics of the game are crazy shooting, crazy explosions, and fragmentation. You can fully enjoy the fun of easily destroying enemies as the fleet continues to grow. However, this game has a high level of difficulty and often requires multiple passes, often resulting in a complete fleet defeat.

Passing the level requires a high level of gaming skills and strategy. There are dozens of spaceships, dozens of fighter jets, and hundreds of turrets in the game, each with its own significance.

In the trial version, only a portion of the spacecraft, artillery, and fighter jets are displayed.

Fleet Formation Layout: You need to purchase various spaceships and freely construct the desired formation. Each type of spacecraft has a huge difference in functionality, with some attack ships equipped with special laser weapons, antimatter weapons, etc. After purchasing a space carrier, you need to purchase various space fighters separately and place them on the carrier.

After starting the battle, all turrets will obey your command. After pressing the attack button, all turrets, weapons of all spacecraft, and all fighter jets in all aircraft carriers will immediately attack towards your mouse cursor.

When exploring various scenes, you will encounter various powerful bosses, unique enemies, and fight against them.

The characteristics of the game are crazy shooting, crazy explosions, and fragmentation. You can fully enjoy the fun of easily destroying enemies as the fleet continues to grow. However, this game has a high level of difficulty and often requires multiple passes, often resulting in a complete fleet defeat.

Passing the level requires a high level of gaming skills and strategy. There are dozens of spaceships, dozens of fighter jets, and hundreds of turrets in the game, each with its own significance.

name: Astrostrike Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1050
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: You are the captain of the Galactic battleship, building hundreds of turrets, raising dozens of space fighters, establishing aircraft carrier groups, and conquering the entire Milky Way. In the trial version, only one type of fighter is displayed, with a small number of turrets ， planets.
supported_languages:
